ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ressply1.s | |- S = ( Poly1 ` R ) |

| 3 |  | ressply1.u | |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) |
| 4 |  | ressply1.b | |- B = ( Base ` U ) |
| 5 |  | ressply1.2 | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |

| 8 |  | ressply1bas2.k | |- K = ( Base ` S ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly H ) = ( 1o mPoly H ) |

| 12 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPwSer H ) = ( 1o mPwSer H ) |

| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` R ) = ( PwSer1 ` R ) |

| 18 | 9, 2, 10, 11, 13, 5, 14, 15, 17 | #P_ressmplbas2 | |- ( ph -> B = ( C i^i K ) ) |
